In your application, you are required to indicate if you are applying for public bursaries, external bursaries, donated bursaries and/or grants in a single submission.
Please refer to the full listing of donor-supported bursaries available, their respective criteria, and awarding quantum.

The SIT Bursary is also applicable to students enrolled in full-time postgraduate programmes of study.
Applications for Public Bursaries, Donated Bursaries & Scholarships will commence in July 2023. Do keep a look out for more information which will be sent to your SIT e-mail address.
Matriculated students are to submit their Financial Aid application via the
. Do note that students are to connect to the SIT VPN before accessing IN4SIT.
Applicants will need to complete and submit the online application form and upload all required supporting documents through the application portal by the given deadline.

article_texts:
Bursaries and Study Grants
Application period: 01 July 2024 to 31 August 2024
Important
Please note that this will be the only application window for donated bursaries and grants in 2024.
In your application, you are required to indicate if you are applying for public bursaries, external bursaries, donated bursaries and/or grants in a single submission.
Please refer to the full listing of donor-supported bursaries available, their respective criteria, and awarding quantum.

How To Apply
Applications for Public Bursaries, Donated Bursaries & Scholarships will commence in July 2023. Do keep a look out for more information which will be sent to your SIT e-mail address.
Matriculated students are to submit their Financial Aid application via the
SIT Student Intranet - IN4SIT
. Do note that students are to connect to the SIT VPN before accessing IN4SIT.
Applicants will need to complete and submit the online application form and upload all required supporting documents through the application portal by the given deadline.
